name: tm39
effect: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II & I: Swift)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.platinum: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It lowers the foe’s Speed.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It lowers the foe’s Speed.
